Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-23166 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-23166 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-9, affected by CVE-2025-23166
